page.title: 09ARABLE FARMING
page.content:
AREA SOUTH OF WESTWOODSIDE
ON A MIXTURE OF WARP, SAND AND BLACK LAND THE CROP IS ROOT VEGETABLE AND CEREAL. FOR EXAMPLE RED BEET, SUGAR BEET, POTATOES, CARROTS, WHEAT, BARLEY, ALSO CABBAGE AND ONIONS> FARMING ANIMAL AT DEBDHILL FARM CATTLE ARE GRAZED. MISTERTON CARR FARM REAR BOTH CATTLE AND PIGS. THEY HAVE A "DAIRY REPLACEMENT" UNIT _ ABOUT 160 HEIFERS ARE REARED EACH YEAR> THERE IS A 152 CELL UNIT FOR PIGS. THEY ARE SENT OUT FOR SLAUGHTER AND THE BACON IS CURED AT WINSFORD, BUT THEY HAVE THEIR OWN FREEZER VAN WHICH DISTRIBUTES THE PORK AND BACON. WITH THE INFLUENCE OF HIGH TECHNOLOGY THE PIGS AND CATTLE ARE "ON COMPUTER".
